channel.title: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Ok im michael! i'm total new to coding and rsps's![/size]
[size=18pt]so i need the basic's, i have 3 folders (cache, source, and client) idk how to get them to run together, and i don't jave JDK but my friend friend you can just do it with the default, if you guys can help me pls add my skype godzkush or post a link to a tut please and thank you!<3[/size]

item.title: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.source: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS

item.title: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

LOL.
Put the cache in ur c drive… download jdk1.7.0_05 and jre7 , and winrar if you dont have that…
In ur client and source edit all the .bat files , the run and compilers and just change the jdk versions to the newest 1s that u have and same with the jre versions… then run the source and run the client and log in.

Read full topic
item.source: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS

item.title: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

nah i started when i was 13 and i couldnt comprehend a damn thing, till i poked my nose into a few things and started figuring what some of it could mean and testing what it really meant to the server…

your teacher tells u not to guess n check. but honestly thats the best way to learn. you dont know exactly how to write it from scratch but u get to learn it hands on by fucking it up. sooo if u need help ill guide u. just make sure you speak comprehensible english!

Read full topic
item.source: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS

item.title: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Please search the forums before asking, there are too many starter guides as it is. And learning a bit of java will help before you get into rsps dev.

Read full topic

item.title: Completely new, need help! Starting off a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

alright im gonna ask a big favor, because everyones already thinking it…

if you can rewrite that post in english, so we can read it instead of google translating it… then i know some of us could help you.

Read full topic
